posts.post_content:
@Palutena  
Actually, because sacrificing the tokens made by the queen would only result in the necessary amount of mana to summon those same slivers back, you wouldn't be able to get unlimited slivers with only those four cards... you COULD do that however if you had those four cards AND a [Heartstone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Heartstone )  making it so the slivers only took one mana to summon and they could sacrifice for two, then yes you could have unlimited mana and slivers :D
posts.html:
@Palutena
